name: Oh Crab! (itch)
description:
A sitcom game featuring sand, water, fish, crabs, bottles, driftwood, seaweed and sandcastles. In this pilot episode, Blubber the fish has a lot of trouble protecting his precious sandcastle from crabs.

Starring Larry Barry as Blubber the fish...... 

Wooh!

......co-starring Fred Shed as hermit crab.

Yeah!

controls

  • arrow keys to move around
  • X to grab objects
  • Z to jump
Current Sokpop Collection

Join the 3$ Sokpop Patreon now to get this game,  and our previous game soko loco, immediately!

An official Sokpop production, recorded in front of a live studio audience.
